description.narrative: Increased understanding of children's priority issues among key decision makers and communities, including opportunities for children to express their views, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes, Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Special Purpose
